articles.title: Harmanpreet Kaur breaks silence over Dhaka outburst with explosive statement - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Harmanpreet Kaur had received a two-match ban from the ICC. | Cricket
articles.content: Indian women's team skipper Harmanpreet Kaur was penalised for her objectionable on and off-the-filed behaviour after India's bitter-sweet tour to Bangladesh. The senior batter was suspended by the I… [+2223 chars]
